title: McDonald’s Employee Accused of Smuggling 80 Lbs of McNuggets
subtitle: Fake news reports that a McDonald's employee was arrested for smuggling home 80 lbs. of Chicken McNuggets  in a bodily orifice.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A McDonald's worker was arrested for theft after smuggling home 80 lbs. of chicken nuggets in his anal cavity.
